KinModel2D¶

class misfit.KinModel2D(galaxy, thetaSettings=<misfit.model.kin_classes.Theta2DSettingsFiducial object>, kinProfile=<misfit.model.kin_classes.KinProfileFiducial object>, intensityProfile=<misfit.model.kin_classes.IntensityProfileFiducial object>, kinModelOptions=<misfit.model.kin_model.KinModel2DOptions object>, do_position_wave_shift=False, do_inst_res_conv_effective=False, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: object

Class to handle kinematic fitting models.
Handles variable + fixed parameters, talks to the Aper2DModel class, creates scaled model to data.
